etymology.interpretation: Refers to vegetarian food or a vegetarian diet, and by extension vegetarianism. Often contrasted with 荤/葷 in menus or dietary descriptions.

examples.chinese: 我坚持素食已经三年了(我堅持素食已經三年了)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ jiānchí sùshí yǐjīng sān nián le.
examples.english: I have stuck to a vegetarian diet for three years.

examples.chinese: 这家餐厅提供多种素食选择(這家餐廳提供多種素食選擇)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè jiā cāntīng tígōng duō zhǒng sùshí xuǎnzé.
examples.english: This restaurant offers many vegetarian options.

examples.chinese: 出于环保和健康的考虑(出於環保和健康的考慮)，他转向素食(他轉向素食)。
examples.pinyin: Chūyú huánbǎo hé jiànkāng de kǎolǜ, tā zhuǎnxiàng sùshí.
examples.english: For environmental and health reasons, he switched to a vegetarian diet.
